full_text: MATERIALS 8 skeins of Purl Soho’s Campo , 50% wool and 50% organically grown cotton. Each skein is 120 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 960 total yards required. US 9 (5.5 mm), 24- or 32-inch circular needles We used the colors below for our samples, but check out 2 other palette ideas here ! TEA ROSE - Color A: Autumn Hellebore; Color B: Fresco Red; Color C: Rosa Rose; Color D: Heirloom White CABANA - Color A: Corsica Yellow; Color B: White Sage; Color C: Eucalyptus Green; Color D: Grotto Blue GAUGE 14 stitches and 28 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch SIZE Finished Dimensions: Approximately 35 x 35 inches Originally designed for Purl Soho by Kristina McGowan . Knit up in this yarn and these colors by Rickie Painter.
name: Ravelry: Four Points Blanket In Campo pattern by Purl Soho
